Question: What is the pre-IVF acupuncture protocol for egg quality?
Answer: Start treatment 3 months before egg retrieval to influence follicular development. KI3 (Taixi) and KI6 (Zhaohai) nourish Kidney Yin for egg quality. CV4 (Guanyuan) and GV4 (Mingmen) balance Kidney Yin and Yang. SP6 (Sanyinjiao) nourishes blood and regulates menstruation. ST36 (Zusanli) strengthens overall Qi. BL23 (Shenshu) tonifies Kidney essence. Treat 1-2x weekly during preparation phase.
Points: KI3, KI6, CV4, GV4, SP6, ST36, BL23
Pharmacopeia: Zuo Gui Wan for Kidney Yin deficiency; You Gui Wan for Kidney Yang deficiency
Safety_Notes: Stop blood-moving herbs 1 week before retrieval

Question: What points support IVF stimulation phase?

Post-transfer (25 mins after): SP6 and ST36 to support implantation. CV4 with gentle moxa to warm uterus. KI3 to nourish Kidney. Yintang for calming.
